title: tvlhhosting.cloud
author: tvlhhosting.cloud
content: Hi, Dyren here - Founder and current CEO of tvlhhosting.cloud - I started this hosting service to offer super affordable services that won't empty your wallet like other hosts.A few things about our host:• Our servers are located are located in Germany, Frankfurt• Currently we only accept Crypto as a payment method, but we are planning on accepting more payment options in the future• Our accepted Crypto Currencies: Bitcoin (BTC), Monero (XMR) and Litecoin (LTC)• You can contact us via email, via ticket system - located on our client portal - or via our Discord server• Server previsions are done manually, usually within 24 hoursYou can check out our plans at our Website or at our Client PortalFor the first 5 people who use the code 4dk9XY at checkout gets 15% off their order!Xeon4GB plan is not available for discountIf you have any questions do not hesitate to contact us!
